text: The 1910 Case football team represented the Case School of Applied Science in the American city of Cleveland, Ohio, now a part of Case Western Reserve University, during the 1910 college football season. The team's coach was Joe Fogg. Case handed the Ohio State Buckeyes their only loss of the 1910 season, and extended a four-game win streak against the Buckeyes, making Coach Joe Fogg a perfect 4-0 against Ohio State during his coaching tenure. ==Schedule== ==References== Case Category:Case Western Reserve Spartans football seasons Case Football
title: 1910 Case football team
